contentrichtext.text: Loom screenshot, taken using [[ScummVM]], scaled using HQ2x filter, with aspect ratio correction. Taken from the scummvm.org screenshots page {{Non-free video game screenshot|image has rationale=yes}} {{Non-free use rationale|Description=Screenshot from ''[[Loom (video game)]]''. |Source=www.scummvm.org , with the screenshot there taken in game with ScummVM. |Portion=A single screenshot, which is trivial compared to the game as a whole, the actual product being sold. |Resolution=Web resolution. |Article=Loom (video game) |Purpose=Identify a typical scene from ''Loom'' and show its graphics; additionally, explain the style of the [[SCUMM]] system in general. |Replaceability=Irreplaceable. It's a copyrighted game; no free image is possible that is also correct for what the game actually is. No art has been released into the public domain to my knowledge. |other_information=This screenshot does not in any way affect the merchantability of the product. }}
